name: The Melding - A Number Logic Puzzle
name_original: The Melding - A Number Logic Puzzle
description:
ORIGINAL GAMEPLAY:
The Melding is a unique number puzzle game that will test your logic skills. Merge lower value tile into higher value tile to ADD. Merge higher or equal value tile into lower value tile to SUBTRACT. To win leave only the base (black) tile on the board with a value of ZERO.

FEATURES:
- 100 Levels
- 10 different playing boards
- Increasing difficulty
- Beautiful minimalist design
- Ability to Undo previous moves
- Hints available
- Universal app

BONUS FEATURE:
The Level Select Menu is a pictorial story! Discover the meaning of "The Melding" by completing game levels to unlock the story panels. Each panel is a beautiful hand-drawn illustration.
